SimpleDataListSpec.Name: MIMED Deapartment Simple Data List
SimpleDataListSpec.Description: A simple data list that returns MIMED deapartment records
SimpleDataListSpec.Author: UM Dev

SPSimpleList.c:CreateProcedureSQL: create procedure dbo.USR_UM_USP_SIMPLEDATALIST_UMHSDEPARTMENT as select ID as VALUE, USR_UMHS_DEPARTMENT.NAME as LABEL from dbo.USR_UMHS_DEPARTMENT order by USR_UMHS_DEPARTMENT.NAME
